skill.name: when-analyzing-skill-gaps-use-skill-gap-analyzer
skill.description: Analyze skill library to identify coverage gaps, redundant overlaps, optimization opportunities, and provide recommendations for skill portfolio improvement
skill.summary: Analyze skill library to identify coverage gaps, redundant overlaps, optimization opportunities, and...
skill.author: DNYoussef

security_audit.summary: Pure analytical skill with no executable code. Reads local skill files and generates analysis reports. Only accesses ~/.claude/skills/ directory for reading SKILL.md files. No network calls, no external commands, no environment access.

content.value_statement: Skill libraries often grow organically, creating gaps and redundancies. This skill systematically analyzes your skill portfolio to identify missing capabilities, duplicate functionality, and optimization opportunities. Get actionable recommendations to improve your skill ecosystem.
actual_capabilities: Map domain coverage and identify missing capabilities
Track skill usage metrics and patterns
limitations: Analyzes only local SKILL.md files in ~/.claude/skills/
Does not create or modify skills automatically
Requires claude-flow hooks and memory MCP for full integration
Does not access external APIs or remote skill repositories

use_cases.title: Portfolio Health Check
use_cases.description: Conduct quarterly reviews of skill coverage, identify gaps, and plan new skill development

use_cases.title: Before Adding New Skills
use_cases.description: Analyze existing capabilities to avoid redundancy and ensure new skills fill real gaps

use_cases.title: Architecture Optimization
use_cases.description: Identify over-complex skills that should be broken down and find composability improvements

prompt_templates.title: Basic Analysis
prompt_templates.prompt: Use the skill gap analyzer to scan my skill library and identify the main coverage gaps and redundancies

prompt_templates.title: Scenario Coverage
prompt_templates.prompt: Run scenario coverage analysis to see if my skill library can handle full-stack web app development and ML pipeline deployment

prompt_templates.title: Optimization Focus
prompt_templates.prompt: Analyze my skill library for under-utilized skills and over-complex skills that need refactoring

prompt_templates.title: Full Report
prompt_templates.prompt: Perform a complete skill gap analysis: inventory, coverage gaps, redundancy detection, optimization opportunities, and generate a prioritized recommendation report

output_examples.input: Analyze my skill library for gaps and optimization opportunities
output: Coverage Gaps: Data Engineering (23% coverage) - Missing: data-transformation, data-validation, data-migration, etl-pipeline
Redundancy: 4 code review skills with 78% overlap - Recommendation: Consolidate into unified code-review-orchestrator
Under-utilized: legacy-converter (1.89% usage, 127 days since last use)
Over-complex: full-stack-architect (8.7K tokens, 64% success rate) - Recommendation: Break into 3 focused skills
Prioritized Actions: 1) Create data-engineering-workflow, 2) Consolidate code review skills, 3) Refactor full-stack-architect

best_practices: Run quarterly analysis to maintain healthy skill coverage above 85%
Address critical gaps first to achieve 90% domain coverage goals
Consolidate skills with over 70% overlap to reduce redundancy below 10%
anti_patterns: Adding new skills without checking for existing overlapping capabilities
Ignoring under-utilized skills (below 5% usage) for too long
Allowing complex skills with low success rates to remain unimproved

faq.question: Which AI tools work with this skill?
faq.answer: Compatible with Claude, Claude Code, and Codex. Requires claude-flow for full hook integration.

faq.question: How many skills can it analyze?
faq.answer: Handles any size library. Large libraries (50+ skills) use sampling and clustering for efficiency.

faq.question: Does it integrate with other tools?
faq.answer: Yes, works with claude-flow hooks, memory MCP, and spawns researcher agent for optimization analysis.

faq.question: Is my skill data safe?
faq.answer: Yes, only reads local SKILL.md files. No data is sent externally or stored outside configured memory.

faq.question: How is this different from prompt optimization?
faq.answer: Skill gap analyzer evaluates portfolio-level health. Prompt optimization analyzes individual skill effectiveness.
